title: Upload Your Music
content: Click here to add your music files. HTMLPlayer supports various audio formats and can extract metadata automatically.
extraContent: Click the "Add Music" button to upload your music files and get started!

title: Player Controls
content: Control playback with these buttons. Adjust volume, tempo, pitch, and enable features like crossfade and gapless playback.
extraContent: Try playing, pausing, and adjusting the volume!

title: Settings
content: Customize HTMLPlayer to your liking. Change themes, adjust audio settings, and configure keyboard shortcuts.
extraContent: Click here to open the settings panel and explore the options!

title: Visualizers
content: Enjoy animated visualizers that react to your music. Choose from various themes and customize the experience.
extraContent: Click this button to toggle the visualizer on and off!

title: Lyrics Support
content: View synchronized lyrics embedded in your audio files. HTMLPlayer supports multiple lyric formats.
extraContent: Click here to show or hide the lyrics panel!
